statements: UPDATE InventoryTracking SET current_stock = 50 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE InventoryTracking SET stockout_alert = TRUE WHERE optimal_stock < current_stock
UPDATE InventoryTracking SET current_stock = 50, optimal_stock = 100, stockout_alert = FALSE WHERE id = 101
UPDATE InventoryTracking SET product_name = 'Office Supplies', current_stock = 75 WHERE id = 102
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = 50 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE stockout_history SET stockout_date = '2022-10-15', stockout_reason = 'Defective product' WHERE stockout_id = 200
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = current_stock - 5, max_stock_level = 100 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE stockout_history SET stockout_reason = 'Damaged goods, require replacement' WHERE stockout_id = 789;
UPDATE products SET product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE stock_levels SET current_stock = 50, optimal_stock = 100 WHERE product_id = 2
UPDATE products SET stock_level = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE stock_levels SET current_stock = 100, optimal_stock = 150 WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE Inventory SET current_stock = 50, optimal_stock = 100 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE Supplies SET supplier_address = '123 Main Street', contact_number = '555-1234' WHERE supplier_id = 201
UPDATE Inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 5 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_number = '+1 123 456 7890' WHERE supplier_id = 200
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 100 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE warehouses SET location = 'New Location' WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 100 WHERE item_name = 'Laptop' AND reorder_level > 50;
UPDATE stock_transfers SET quantity_transferred = 50, transfer_date = '2022-05-15 15:30:00' WHERE from_warehouse_id = 1 AND to_warehouse_id = 2;
